text: musaykk nam vedagrantham nalkukayuntayi. ennitt atinre karyattilum abhiprayavyatyasamuntayi. oru vacanam mump tanne ninre raksitavinre pakkal ninn untayittillayirunnuvenkil avarkkitayil (ippeal tanne) tirppukalpikkappetumayirunnu. tirccayayum avar itine (khur'anine) parri avisvasajanakamaya sansayattilakunnu
